chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 product has the above problem.
As I had imagined, unfortunately it wasn't and what's important to me is that the phone doesn't have original packaging or a package and for that reason, I can't have it otherwise top phone.

Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

For refund.


Regards,
Celia-Cristina from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We await the arrival of the parcel.

Regards,
AS

Hello ecomobile,

The carrier informs us that the package has been delivered, as indicated in the tracking link. If you did not receive the package, we must open an investigation with the carrier.

In order to open this investigation I kindly ask that you provide us with the following documents within the next 24 hours:
- the signed certificate of non-receipt of the package (see attachment)
- a copy of the complaint filed against X for identity theft or theft (mentioning the package number and order ID). I advise you to detail the facts as comprehensively as possible and, if possible, to attach the proof of delivery. Once you have signed the complaint, I invite you to send it to us.

Do not hesitate to contact us should you have any further questions.

I wish you a pleasant day,
Celia-Cristina from the BackCare team

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund. Thank you for your understanding and cooperation.

Regards,
KW
